The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
It gives me great pleasure to invite all secondary school parents to the meet the teacher day on Saturday September 1st 2012.The event will run from 10am to 11:30am and there will be a chance for parents to meet the new staff, each student’s form tutor and all of their subject teachers.
The grid below gives the overview of the plan for the secondary school event
Times
Programme
10:00am
Refreshments and an opportunity to meet the staff in the Sports Hall.
10:30am
An introduction to life in the secondary school. Focus will be on the changes to the school as well as the three academic stages of the Key Stage 3, 4 and 5. There will also be information on the Pastoral system
11:00am
Refreshments and a further chance to meet the staff in the Sports Hall
11:30am
End of the event
Please remember that this event is not an opportunity for a formal parent consultation, we will arrange these later in the term when the children have settled. Parents are encouraged to use the Nanhu Amusement Park’s car park, as in previous years, as our own car park facilities are limited.
Regards,
Mr. Iain Ruck Head of Secondary The British School of Guangzhou World Class Education
